attributes.action: Ban Alcohol consumption and sale in all UK Government and Parliament workplaces
attributes.additional_details:
Set an example to the UK and World that we mean business 

Since Sue Gray’s report we need the government to clean their act up

Boris Johnson and some of the conservatives have created a booze culture
attributes.background:
Amend ‘The Alcohol/Drug Policy in the Workplace for the Public Service’ to include:-

Ban Alcohol consumption and sale in all UK Government and Parliament workplaces.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604101
